author: ShadowSlam
name: Dusk in the Home of the Perturbed
Scholar
ability: You start knowing which Demon(s) & Minion(s) are in play.
firstNightReminder: Show the Scholar every in-play evil character token.

name: Blacksmith
ability: You start knowing how many Outsiders are in play. All Outsiders are drunk, even if you are dead. [-? to +? Outsiders]
firstNightReminder: Show the Blacksmith the number of in-play outsiders.

jinxes.reason: If the Marionette thinks that they are the Blacksmith, -? to +? Outsiders might have been removed or added.

name: Pirate
ability: You start knowing how many Pirates are in-play. If Pirates are the only good characters alive, good wins. [+0 to +2 Pirates]
firstNightReminder: Show each Pirate the number of in-play Pirates.

name: Coachman
ability: Each day, choose a 1 word topic on which the Storyteller tells you 1 fact. If an alive neighbour is evil, you get false info.
firstNightReminder: Mark the Coachman with False Info if a living neighbour is evil.
otherNightReminder: Mark the Coachman with False Info if a living neighbour is evil.

name: Beekeeper
ability: One evil player registers as good and as a Townsfolk or Outsider. If you publicly guess who it is (once per game), your team wins.
firstNightReminder: Mark an evil player as Beekept. Do not show them evil info.

name: Mole
ability: You are a Minion & register as evil. If most Minions & Demons publicly guess you (once), your team loses, even if dead, drunk or poisoned.
firstNightReminder: Wake the Mole and show them the Minion they are.

name: Queen
ability: If both of your neighbours are good, they learn who you are. Anyone mad about a Queen being in-play might be executed.
firstNightReminder: If both of the Queen's neighbours are good wake them and show them the 'This character selected you' card and then the Queen token

name: Casanova
ability: Each night, choose a living player (not yourself): if they're executed & they are good, your team loses.
firstNightReminder: The Casanova points to a player. Mark them with the "Chosen" reminder token.
otherNightReminder: The Casanova points to a player. Mark them with the "Chosen" reminder token.

name: Amaniti
ability: Your neighbors register falsely to good players' abilities.
firstNightReminder: Mark the Amaniti's neighbours with Registers Falsely

jinxes.reason: The Amaniti's neighbours do not register falsely to the Ogre.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Amaniti ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.

name: Vat Dweller
ability: Every Outsider is the same Outsider. Evil players start knowing which. [+? to -? Outsiders]

name: Hwisp
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If nominated by a Townsfolk, you die. If 2 Townsfolk nominate in a day, evil wins.
otherNightReminder: The Hwisp points to a player. That player dies.

name: Le Cadeau
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Townsfolk to nominate Le Cadeau becomes an evil Le Cadeau & you die tonight.

name: Fanzazz
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die & you become their alignment. If you die, your team loses. If only 2 players live, your team wins.
otherNightReminder: The Fanzazz points to a player. They die and the Fanzazz becomes the alignment of that player.
